divs: Sighting DetailsDriving down route 61, heading into pottsville, pa. Glanced up and saw what appeared to be a round shere shaped metalic object ascend over the tumbling run mtn. At first I tought it must have been a helium ballon but then I thought from the distance I saw it, it would have had to been a very large ballon. The incident only lasted a few seconds as it dissappeared over the mountain.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Pottsville
There were no other sightings in Pottsville on or around May 20th 2012
